医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
机器学习工具读取大脑扫描以发现精神病的早期迹象使用机器学习工具可以在精神病发作之前进行预测，该工具可以将 MRI 脑部扫描分为健康人群和有精神病发作风险的人群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Machine-learning-tool-reads-brain-scans-for-early-signs-of-psychosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Machine-learning-tool-reads-brain-scans-for-early-signs-of-psychosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72bcc850-8cb3-436a-8816-6a2694bcd562 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 22:50:56 -0500 Machine learning tool reads brain scans for early signs of psychosis
UT Health San Antonio科学家获得120万美元用于实施糖尿病前期早期干预措施超过三分之一的人患有糖尿病前期，其特点是血糖水平异常，尚未达到糖尿病范围，但与眼部、肾脏和神经系统疾病以及心血管死亡风险的显着增加相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/UT-Health-San-Antonio-scientist-receives-2412-million-to-implement-early-intervention-measures-for-pre-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/UT-Health-San-Antonio-scientist-receives-2412-million-to-implement-early-intervention-measures-for-pre-diabetes.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=969ccab0-0043-4c35-a469-b0b4c539fdbf Thu, 08 Feb 2024 22:39:47 -0500 UT Health San Antonio scientist receives $1.2 million to implement early intervention measures for pre-diabetes
研究发现，重复 PlGF 测试对先兆子痫无益新研究发现，无需重复进行单一测试即可加快孕妇严重疾病的诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Repeat-PlGF-testing-for-pre-eclampsia-not-beneficial-research-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Repeat-PlGF-testing-for-pre-eclampsia-not-beneficial-research-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d797775-fe8b-4fd1-a675-5655b66fa95d Thu, 08 Feb 2024 22:29:46 -0500 Repeat PlGF testing for pre-eclampsia not beneficial, research finds
选择性雄激素受体调节剂对 ER 阳性乳腺癌患者具有抗肿瘤作用今天（2024 年 2 月 8 日）在《柳叶刀肿瘤学》上发表的一篇研究论文表明，药物 enobosarm（一种刺激男性性激素受体的选择性雄激素受体调节剂）对雌激素受体阳性乳腺癌患者具有抗肿瘤作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Selective-androgen-receptor-modulator-has-anti-tumor-effects-in-ER-positive-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Selective-androgen-receptor-modulator-has-anti-tumor-effects-in-ER-positive-breast-cancer-患者.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80b589e7-5a5b-460a-8a59-54aa591f54dc Thu, 08 Feb 2024 22:03:09 -0500 Selective androgen receptor modulator has anti-tumor effects in ER-positive breast cancer patients
人工智能模型在预测心脏病风险方面显示出前景，但缺乏验证该评论强调了人工智能模型在预测心血管疾病风险方面的潜力，但强调需要独立的外部验证以确保其临床适用性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/AI-models-show-promise-in-predicting-heart-disease-risks-but-lack-validation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/AI-models-show-promise-in-predicting-heart-disease-risks-but-lack-validation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86e2c120-c1a8-4e46-b70b-430e9bf19d22 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 21:59:00 -0500 AI models show promise in predicting heart disease risks, but lack validation
激素类固醇可能使淋病无法治愈您知道包装上警告口服避孕药不能预防性传播感染吗？就淋病而言，引起这种疾病的性传播细菌可以利用这些激素来帮助其抵抗抗生素的攻击。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Hormonal-steroids-could-make-gonorrea-untreatable.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Hormonal-steroids-could-make-gonorrea-untreatable.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8aa8ff86-c9ec-4c46-ba54-b76cf669e781 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 21:42:09 -0500 Hormonal steroids could make gonorrhea untreatable
新的宫颈癌检测方法有望减少不必要的筛查BMC Medicine 研究引入了 CerMe 检测方法，利用 PCDHGB7 高甲基化来有效分类高危 HPV 阳性女性，从而可能减少不必要的阴道镜检查转诊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/New-cervical-cancer-detection-method-promises-to-reduce-unnecessary-screenings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/New-cervical-cancer-detection-method-promises-to-reduce-unnecessary-screenings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d32fdb19-fc5a-4a9f-a1dc-47c4e78ed668 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 21:40:00 -0500 New cervical cancer detection method promises to reduce unnecessary screenings
新研究通过创新模型绘制了广泛的神经多样性JCCP Advances 的一项研究引入了一种新模型来理解广泛的神经多样性，揭示个体特征可以跨越多种神经发育条件，从而为神经多样性提供了一种更细致的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/New-study-maps-the-broad-spectrum-of-neurodiversity-with-innovative-model.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/New-study-maps-the-broad-spectrum-of-neurodiversity-with-innovative-model.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b485c02c-2534-47a0-9c2a-d556422f336e Thu, 08 Feb 2024 21:30:00 -0500 New study maps the broad spectrum of neurodiversity with innovative model
研究显示，静脉注射 DMT 有望减少抑郁症状《科学报告》中的一项研究表明，静脉注射 DMT 可以显着降低健康志愿者的抑郁严重程度，突显其作为治疗精神健康障碍的迷幻治疗干预措施的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Intravenous-DMT-shows-promise-in-reducing-depression-symptoms-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Intravenous-DMT-shows-promise-in-reducing-depression-symptoms-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e65bb5a-a6f2-4f05-a046-45b894e9ecfe Thu, 08 Feb 2024 21:20:00 -0500 Intravenous DMT shows promise in reducing depression symptoms, study reveals
AI 从咳嗽中检测出 COVID-19 的能力面临着现实世界的挑战Nature Machine Intelligence 的一项研究表明，虽然 AI 分类器可以从录音中预测 COVID-19，但在考虑到混杂因素时，其有效性会降低，这突显了在现实环境中应用 AI 诊断的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/AIs-ability-to-detect-COVID-19-from-coughs-faces-real-world-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/AIs-ability-to-detect-COVID-19-from-coughs-faces-real-world-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ad75579-731a-4075-a06b-2791faa250a8 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 21:05:00 -0500 AI's ability to detect COVID-19 from coughs faces real-world challenges
